lyrics.stanza: O Jesus, my Lord and Savior, Help me to fully follow Thee In life and death and loving service, As Thou hast lived and died for me.
He died for me that I might die To Satan, self, and sin; O death so deep! O life so high! Help me to enter in.
He lives for me that I may live As spotless e'en as He; Savior, to me Thy nature give, And live Thy life in me.
He lives for me that I may give His love to hearts that pine; Let me like Him for others live, And trace His steps divine.
